title: Uniform rod collides with a ball at rest

content.question:
A system consists of a ball of mass M2 and a uniform rod of mass M1 and length d. The rod is attached to a horizontal frictionless table by a pivot at point P and initially rotates at an angular speed ùúî , as shown above left. The rotational inertia of the rod about point P is¬†¬†<math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msub> <mi>M</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msup> <mi>d</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math> .
